channel.title: [317 Delta]Change way NPC's Face
channel.description: Hi is there any way i can change the way an npc faces when i spawn them?

item.title: [317 Delta]Change way NPC's Face
item.dc:creator: @Fall Fall
item.description:
@Fall wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:6, topic:343818”]Your suppose to add it after all of this stuff

NPC newNPC = new NPC(slot, npcType); newNPC.absX = x; newNPC.absY = y; newNPC.makeX = x; newNPC.makeY = y; newNPC.moverangeX1 = rangex1; newNPC.moverangeY1 = rangey1; newNPC.moverangeX2 = rangex2; newNPC.moverangeY2 = rangey2; newNPC.walkingType = WalkingType; newNPC.HP = HP; newNPC.MaxHP = HP;[/quote]

It still isnt working i tried +1 +2 -1 and such and my npc still doesnt turn. here is my code.

if (newNPC.npcType == 9) { if ((newNPC.absX == 3107) && (newNPC.absY == 9515)) { newNPC.TurnNpcTo(newNPC.absX +2, newNPC.absY); } }

Read full topic

Your suppose to add it after all of this stuff

item.title: [317 Delta]Change way NPC's Face
item.dc:creator: @Fall Fall
item.description:
@Fall wrote:

deathschaos9:

public void newNPC

Now it comes up with this.

.\src\NPCHandler.java:2465: cannot find symbol symbol : variable newNPC location: class NPCHandler if (newNPC.npcType == 9) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2466: cannot find symbol symbol : variable newNPC location: class NPCHandler if ((newNPC.absX == 3107) && (newNPC.absY == 9516)) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2466: cannot find symbol symbol : variable newNPC location: class NPCHandler if ((newNPC.absX == 3107) && (newNPC.absY == 9516)) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2467: cannot find symbol symbol : variable newNPC location: class NPCHandler newNPC.TurnNpcTo(newNPC.absX -1, newNPC.absY); ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2467: cannot find symbol symbol : variable newNPC location: class NPCHandler newNPC.TurnNpcTo(newNPC.absX -1, newNPC.absY); ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2467: cannot find symbol symbol : variable newNPC location: class NPCHandler newNPC.TurnNpcTo(newNPC.absX -1, newNPC.absY); ^ 6 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: [317 Delta]Change way NPC's Face
item.dc:creator: @Fall Fall
item.description:
@Fall wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:343818”]In NPCHandler, newNPC method, add this

[quote]if (newNPC.npcType == A) {
if ((newNPC.absX == B) && (newNPC.absY == C)) {
newNPC.TurnNpcTo(newNPC.absX -1, newNPC.absY);
}
}[/quote]
A - NPC Id
B - NPC Xcoord
C - NPC Ycoord
-1 - New Direction
Idk the exact numbers to get it to face which way, but there +1, -1, -2. Experiment.[/quote]

Where do i add this?
i can find npc methods but multiples of them

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Delta]Change way NPC's Face
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

In NPCHandler, newNPC method, add this

if (newNPC.npcType == A) { if ((newNPC.absX == B) && (newNPC.absY == C)) { newNPC.TurnNpcTo(newNPC.absX -1, newNPC.absY); } }
A - NPC Id B - NPC Xcoord C - NPC Ycoord -1 - New Direction Idk the exact numbers to get it to face which way, but there +1, -1, -2. Experiment.

Read full topic
